doc:
Allyn King https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allyn_King 0 Allyn S. King (February 1, 1899 – March 31, 1930) was an American stage and film actress and singer who began her career in vaudeville, and later as a Ziegfeld Follies performer. King's 1930 suicide was the end result of her long struggle to satisfy the demands put on her by directors and producers to remain abnormally slim. Allyn_S._King ( February_1_,_1899 – March_31_,_1930 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actress and singer who began her_career in vaudeville , and later as a_Ziegfeld_Follies_performer . King 's_1930_suicide was the_end_result of her_long_struggle to_satisfy the_demands put on her by directors_and_producers to_remain abnormally_slim .
